summary: The diff implements REQ-2 by adding Santanu Sir's profile image path in the Teachers component. However, there is no evidence that the image file 'image (2)-6.jpg' was actually saved to frontend/public/assets/ as required by the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: The uploaded image is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only code changes to Teachers.tsx and documentation files. There is no evidence of the image file 'image (2)-6.jpg' being added to frontend/public/assets/. The ADDED FILES section shows 'none', meaning no new files were added.
